item.description:
This weekend a friendly crowd of regular Climbing Meetup members and experienced outdoor climbers are going for a weekend climbing trip to the renown Gunks in New York!!! Plan is to leave Boston Friday evening, climb/hike/outdoors it Sat+Sun, and then return to the city late afternoon Sunday. We'll be carpooling and camping out as a group. If you're interested post a "Maybe" and shoot me an email or Meetup "greeting" to coordinate on carpooling, gear to bring, food, etc. Feel free to contact me with any questions you have.

Some info on the Gunks here:
http://www.gunks.com/...

Have a nice weekend all!

Brendan
brendan.meetup@gmail.com
item.name: Outdoor Climbing at the Gunks!!!
